name: Spring Falls
description:
Spring Falls is a puzzle game about water, erosion, and watching things grow.
Manipulate the landscape and bring wildflowers to life as you make your way down a peaceful mountainside.
Features:
• 60 hand-crafted levels
• Unique gameplay revolving around water flow
• Soft visuals, ambient-folk soundtrack, and environmental
sounds for a meditative, relaxing experience
• No ads or in-app purchases
